message: How should i contact Cimb Lucky Garden branch? No any contact number to contact them?

Dear CIMB,

Tolong sahkan berita ini. Saya dah call Maybank dan juga CIMB CS, mereka sahkan. Cuma tiada apa-apa pengumuman dibuat oleh pihak CIMB dan Maybank di web cimbclicks dan maybank2u. Ini boleh mengelirukan klien2 anda.

Do your part to help flood victims in the East Coast, Johor and Perak! 

#CIMBFoundation has set up flood relief collection points at the locations below, to collect food and items such as ready-to-eat meals (pre-cooked rice/dishes, canned food with pull rings only, biscuits, cereal), bottled water, canned/boxed drinks, baby formula, 3-in-1 coffee and tea, diapers, sanitary napkins, and milk (boxed, not fresh). #TeamCIMB will be there to assist you with your contribution. 

Every little bit counts, so let's do some good & help our fellow Malaysians during these difficult times.
Hi may I know how many days CIMB take to clear local cheques?

Good morning CIMB. 
I got very serious question about this link. 
http://www.cimbbank.com.my/en/personal/press-releases/promotions/important-notices/notice-on-opt-in-for-1-mail-order-telephone-order-cnp.html

Can you verify that this is true? Because it is not from your official website. And if you can share about opt at your official website, this will make people clearly understand what is opt and is it exist?
